page.title: 15EMERSON COLLEGE
page.content: This private college, which includes Tablehurst Farm, is found in north- west Forest Row. Its main area of study is rural development and its farm is 230 acres in size. The college was founded in 1962 but moved to its present site in 1964.Most of the students are over 21 and pay Â£3,390 for their first year's study.This figure decreases over the next 2 years.The students are drawn from over 20 different countries.Other than agiculture students can study voice development, speech and drama, sculpture and flow design, biodynamic farming, social development and educational eurythmy.
